viewData.name: PhiNesse Brush Medium Powder Brush 2
viewData.short_description: A medium, dome-shaped, dense brush for applying powders.┬áThis brush is particularly soft for generous, perfectly even application. Its thickness and density allow it to offer moderate-to-high coverage, and the long handle allows a grip farther from the tuft for increased movement when applying. It features both straight and wavy fibers, and can be used with loose and compact powders.┬á
viewData.long_description: A medium, dome-shaped, dense brush for applying powders.┬áThis brush is particularly soft for generous, perfectly even application. Its thickness and density allow it to offer moderate-to-high coverage, and the long handle allows a grip farther from the tuft for increased movement when applying. It features both straight and wavy fibers, and can be used with loose and compact powders.┬á
